description:
The leading WebAssembly Runtime supporting WASI and Emscripten

Wasmer is a fast and secure WebAssembly runtime that enables super lightweight containers to run anywhere: from Desktop to the Cloud, Edge and IoT devices.
This release adds support for object size estimation, adds better proxy support, improves executable spawning, and contains various bug fixes.
Added
- #5079 Add feature for objects' sizes estimation
- #5125 oss-fuzz: add cifuzz
- #5110 Add new --invoke arg for choosing entry function for single WASM modules + fix --invoke not working for WASI(X) modules
- #5090 Add the right to fetch stats on pipes
- #5088 Various cleanup chores + add a new test
Changed
- #5127 Implement proper executable spawn
- #5098 js::module: leave warning comment on the Send impl
- #5120 Improve QueryError
- #5118 InMemory/MultiSource Improvements
- #5104 Transfer the file size when renamed
- #5102 chore(wasix): Reduce syscall instrumentation levels
- #5096 Update cargo-deny config
- #4983 deps: Upgrade some dependencies + lift to workspace root
- #5092 Replace WASM_ANYREF with WASM_EXTERNREF
- #5091 Apply the proxy setting in wasmer config
- #5089 feat(cli): Restore packages from webcs
Fixed
- #5124 Various fixes to get wasmer-js compiling
- #5108 Fix error in metering middleware
